Hiring Manager 
WOO X 
Dear Hiring Manager, 
I am excited to apply for the Exchange Operations Specialist position at WOO X. With 
over five years of experience in financial services, cryptocurrency operations, and 
compliance-driven IT solutions, I am confident in my ability to contribute meaningfully to 
WOO X’s mission of providing best-in-class liquidity and exceptional trading experiences. 
During my tenure at KPMG Luxembourg as a Senior IT Auditor, I led various IT 
compliance and risk management projects, ensuring adherence to global standards such 
as ISO 27001 and DORA. This experience has given me a robust understanding of 
regulatory requirements and risk management frameworks, which I applied to enhance 
operational resilience for international clients. I successfully developed data-driven solutions 
that reduced fund reconciliation times by 30%, aligning with your need for operational 
efficiency and accurate reporting. 
My passion for the crypto and blockchain space led me to pursue an MBA in Blockchain 
& Big Data at HEC Liège Luxembourg, where I was awarded a scholarship for my proposal 
focusing on leveraging blockchain technology and the Ocean Protocol to improve 
compliance and data integrity for SMEs. This project deepened my understanding of 
decentralized systems, digital asset management, and regulatory considerations in the crypto 
industry. 
I have practical experience in liquidity management, having worked on financial data 
analysis and automated reporting systems that ensured accurate and timely metrics 
presentation to senior management. My background also includes developing microservices 
architectures with FastAPI, creating CI/CD pipelines, and deploying infrastructure that 
supports high-volume, data-driven platforms—skills that are essential for auditing exchange 
performance and ensuring smooth trading operations. 
At my start-up initiative HomeSmartify.lu, I made efforts to develop AI-driven solutions, 
working closely with marketing, technology, and customer-facing teams to streamline 
product delivery and user experience. I am eager to bring this collaborative spirit to WOO X, 
supporting key account management and enhancing trader satisfaction. 
What draws me most to WOO X is your commitment to radical transparency and market 
integrity, values that resonate strongly with my professional ethos. I am excited about the 
opportunity to contribute to your vision of advancing decentralization and driving innovation 
in CeFi and DeFi. 
Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss how 
my background in financial compliance, digital asset management, and operational

optimization can support WOO X’s continued growth and excellence in the cryptocurrency 
exchange industry. 
Best regards, 
Ruiqi Tan

Dear Hiring Manager, 
I am excited to apply for the Engineering Manager position at Nethermind. The 
opportunity to lead cross-functional teams at the intersection of AI, blockchain, and 
decentralized systems aligns perfectly with my career ambitions and technical background. 
With over five years of experience in AI/ML development, DevOps engineering, 
and blockchain solutions, I am confident in my ability to drive projects that deliver tangible 
results while embracing innovation. 
My passion for integrating AI and Web3 technologies was the foundation of my proposal 
to automate IT compliance consulting for SMEs. This project, which earned me 
a scholarship for my MBA in Blockchain & Big Data at HEC Liège Luxembourg, focused 
on leveraging AI-powered solutions and decentralized data protocols, specifically using 
the Ocean Protocol. Through this experience, I not only deepened my understanding of 
decentralized systems but also learned the importance of translating complex technologies 
into practical business applications. Developing and delivering this solution required 
resilience, long-term focus, and a continuous "give-in" attitude—traits I believe are essential 
in managing high-impact engineering teams. 
Professionally, I have led AI-driven projects such as fine-tuning Large Language Models 
(LLMs) like Mistral 7B for automated dialogue systems at HomeSmartify.lu, where I 
managed the entire lifecycle—from research and prototyping to deployment. In parallel, my 
role at KPMG Luxembourg involved designing data-driven solutions that improved 
reconciliation processes by 30%, demonstrating my ability to drive efficiency in complex 
systems. These experiences have strengthened my project management skills and my capacity 
to lead teams in high-pressure environments to deliver robust, production-ready solutions. 
I believe that interdisciplinary knowledge is key to harnessing the full potential of AI. 
Bridging expertise in AI, blockchain, and compliance has allowed me to think holistically 
about problem-solving, ensuring that technical innovations are aligned with user needs and 
regulatory landscapes. I am particularly drawn to Nethermind’s open ethosand commitment 
to innovating in public—a value I share through my past work in open-source projects and 
public-facing AI initiatives. 
What excites me most about this opportunity is the chance to work alongside experts 
in Ethereum protocol engineering, layer-2 solutions, and cryptography while pushing the 
boundaries of what’s possible with AI and decentralized systems. I am eager to contribute my 
leadership skills, technical expertise, and interdisciplinary approach to further Nethermind’s 
mission of empowering enterprises and developers globally. 
Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to discussing how my background 
can support the delivery of transformative AI x Crypto projects and contribute to the success 
of Nethermind’s diverse and innovative team.

Best regards, 
Ruiqi Tan

Dear Hiring Manager, 
I am excited to apply for the Backend Developer position at your company. With over five

experience provided me with a deep understanding of financial services, including banking, 
payments, and regulatory frameworks. I also gained practical exposure to reconciliation

Technically, I have solid backend development experience with a primary focus

Beyond backend development, I have explored blockchain and distributed ledger

I am particularly drawn to this opportunity because it combines my passion for backend

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to discussing how my background

Dear Hiring Manager, 
I am excited to apply for the AI/ML Engineer (Python) position at Deel. With over five 
years of experience in backend engineering and over two years in AI and machine 
learning, I am confident in my ability to develop innovative solutions that align with Deel’s 
mission of connecting global talent with companies worldwide. My background in Python 
development, PostgreSQL, and the data science stack, coupled with my hands-on 
experience in building AI-powered applications, positions me to make significant 
contributions to your cross-functional teams. 
At HomeSmartify.lu, I led the development of AI-driven dialogue systems, fine-
tuning Large Language Models (LLMs) like Mistral 7B to automate smart home 
configurations. This project involved creating robust ETL pipelines, handling large datasets, 
and ensuring seamless integration with end-user applications. I utilized Python extensively to 
develop and deploy scalable models, optimizing code for production environments and 
ensuring efficient model serving through cloud-based platforms. 
During my time at KPMG Luxembourg, I spearheaded the creation of data-driven solutions 
that improved fund reconciliation processes by 30%. This involved collaborating with cross-
functional teams, including business stakeholders and data scientists, to design and 
implement SQL-based pipelines and RESTful APIs for data extraction, transformation, and 
loading. My work focused on ensuring data integrity and optimizing backend systems for 
performance and scalability. 
My MBA in Blockchain & Big Data from HEC Liège Luxembourg, for which I was 
awarded a scholarship, further strengthened my technical and strategic skill set. My research 
centered on using blockchain technology and the Ocean Protocol to enhance compliance 
processes for SMEs, demonstrating my ability to merge advanced technologies with practical 
business solutions. This project also involved developing predictive models and 
implementing them into real-world use cases—skills that translate directly into the demands 
of the AI/ML Engineer role at Deel. 
Throughout my career, I have remained committed to continuous learning and collaboration. 
I thrive in team environments where I can engage with engineers, product managers, and 
business stakeholders to deliver solutions that address complex challenges. My experience 
participating in the Kaggle LLM preference prediction competition further honed my 
expertise in information retrieval, text processing, and NLP techniques. 
I am particularly drawn to Deel’s vision of breaking down global hiring barriers and 
fostering inclusivity through technology. The opportunity to contribute to a platform that 
empowers companies and talents worldwide resonates deeply with my values and 
professional goals.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to discussing how my background 
in AI development, backend engineering, and data science can help drive Deel’s 
innovative solutions forward. 
Best regards, 
Ruiqi Tan

Dear Hiring Manager, 
I am excited to apply for the AI Consultant (Private Equity Insights) role at Correlation One. 
With a background in AI, large language models (LLMs), and IT auditing, I bring a unique 
fusion of technical acumen, regulatory awareness, and financial insight that aligns perfectly 
with this role. My expertise in Generative AI, machine learning, and AI compliance 
frameworks allows me to provide valuable insights on AI trends, risks, and opportunities in 
private equity investments. 
In my current role as a Senior IT Auditor at KPMG Luxembourg, I have led AI-driven 
compliance assessments, ensuring adherence to ISO 27001, DORA, and GDPR. I have advised 
international clients on AI governance, security risks, and regulatory implications, making me 
well-versed in compliance frameworks like the EU AI Act and NIST guidelines. Furthermore, 
my MBA in Blockchain & Big Data from HEC Liège Luxembourg has equipped me with a 
strong financial and technological foundation, allowing me to analyze AI trends from both a 
technical and economic perspective. 
Beyond consulting, I have actively developed and deployed AI-driven solutions: 
• AI Newsletter Automation: I designed and deployed an AI-powered news 
scraper(Hybride_AI_Soup_Webscraper) that automatically extracts, categorizes, and 
summarizes AI news from global sources, providing tailored insights for decision-
makers. 
• Generative AI & LLM Fine-Tuning: I fine-tuned Mistral-7B to create a smart home AI 
assistant, optimizing model responses through synthetic training data and RLHF 
techniques. 
• Deploying LLMs for Business Intelligence: I implemented Llama 2 on Ubuntu, 
optimizing AI deployment for enterprise applications. 
• AI-Powered Predictive Analytics: I built an LLM-based user preference predictor, 
leveraging DistilBERT fine-tuning for AI-generated investment insights. 
My experience in writing AI reports, synthesizing market intelligence, and advising on 
regulatory landscapes would allow me to deliver clear, strategic, and data-driven insights for 
your private equity partners. Additionally, my strong communication skills in English, German, 
and Chinese enable me to effectively engage with a diverse global audience. 
I am eager to contribute my expertise to Correlation One's mission of shaping the AI 
economy and would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my skills align with your needs. 
Please find my CV attached for your review. I look forward to your response. 
Best regards, 
Ruiqi Tan
Dear Hiring Manager, 
I feel myself very suitable for the role Analyste-Programmeur RH at CFL. With a strong 
background in IT auditing, DevOps engineering, and software development, I am confident 
that my skills align well with the needs of your team. I am multilingua speaking english, 
german, chinese and french (B1) level. 
Throughout my career, I have worked on designing and implementing IT solutions that 
enhance business processes, improve system security, and optimize software deployment. As 
a Senior IT Auditor at KPMG Luxembourg, I conducted IT security audits, assessed 
regulatory compliance (ISO 27001, DORA, GDPR, PSD2), and automated data analysis to 
streamline IT controls. My experience in DevOps engineering at Whale Cloud 
Technologies (Alibaba Group) further strengthened my expertise in web and mobile 
development, where I built and managed CI/CD pipelines, integrated APIs, and ensured the 
security and scalability of cloud-based platforms. 
In addition to my corporate experience, I have actively contributed to innovative projects, 
such as: 
• Developing a chatbot using fine-tuned AI models to assist users in configuring 
smart home solutions, an experience that demonstrates my ability to create interactive, 
user-friendly applications. 
• Deploying LLaMA2 on an Ubuntu VM, optimizing machine learning models for 
real-world applications. 
• Building a FastAPI-based microservice with MySQL, showcasing my proficiency 
in backend development and database administration. 
I am particularly excited about this opportunity at CFL because it combines my technical 
skills with a domain that has a tangible impact on HR processes. My experience with 
Node.js, JavaScript, PL/SQL, API integrations, and Unix/Linux environments aligns 
closely with the role’s requirements. Furthermore, my working experience as deployment 
manager on-site by la Post lxuembourg enables me to translate complex technical challenges 
into practical solutions that benefit end-users. 
Beyond my technical expertise, I take pride in my ability to work autonomously while 
fostering collaboration within cross-functional teams. My past roles as Devops at project 
“UP-drei” in vienna required me to coordinate between developers and clients, document 
processes, train users, and provide technical support—skills that are crucial for ensuring 
smooth system implementations in an HR environment. 
I am eager to bring my experience in IT development, security, and automation to CFL and 
contribute to building innovative HR applications. I look forward to the opportunity to 
discuss how my skills and background can support your team. 
I am available for an interview at your convenience. 
Best regards, 
Ruiqi Tan

Dear Hiring Manager, 
I am excited to apply for the Senior Software Engineer – Generative AI position at Elastic. 
With over five years of software development and AI/ML engineering experience, I bring 
a blend of technical expertise, problem-solving ability, and a commitment to delivering user-
focused solutions. Elastic’s mission of harnessing AI to enhance data-driven security

In my enterprise initiatie of HomeSmartify.lu, I developed of AI-powered dialogue

the text for newsletter and designed the HTML interface, showcasing my proficiency 
in TypeScript, React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Prior to this, at KPMG Luxembourg, I 
improved fund reconciliation processes by 30% through robust backend 
solutions.My DevOps experience at Whalecloud Technology ensures that I can deliver 
scalable, stable code in production environments. 
I strongly believe that interdisciplinary knowledge is key to harnessing AI’s full potential. 
My MBA in Blockchain & Big Data, supported by a scholarship for my proposal on 
integrating AI and Web3 technologies for IT compliance automation, reflects my dedication 
to merging technical solutions with practical business needs. Delivering this project

What excites me most about Elastic is the opportunity to work with a diverse, distributed 
team on solutions that directly enhance security workflows through generative AI. I am

and contributing to open-source initiatives to help Elastic deliver cutting-edge security 
features. 
Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the possibility of contributing to 
Elastic’s mission of transforming data-driven decision-making with innovative AI solutions. 
Best regards, 
Ruiqi Tan
